name: Box Labyrinth
description: Use boxes to make bridges across the water, and keep buttons held down that open gates that block your path. In certain stages, you will need to co-operate with a partner (that you can switch to freely) to get boxes out of tight spots, hold down a button, or give you the positioning you need to solve a puzzle. Conveyor belts provide additional challenge by restricting your movement, often acting as a one-way door.
